title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Major Hezbollah Military Base in Southern Lebanon: An In-depth Look at the Recent Conflict”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a large military complex of the Radwan Force in southern Lebanon

A short while ago, fighter jets attacked a military complex which has seven military buildings of the Radwan Force, a faction of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Al-Khiyam area. In addition, IDF forces attacked a military command associated with the organization in the Kfar Tura area.

IDF forces attacked the sources of fire in the Kochaba and Miss Al-Jabal areas in southern Lebanon in response to barrages identified earlier today towards the Golan Heights and the Menara area.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3U7BC1P
